/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's view of the scene. The sun is shining brightly in the clear blue sky, casting a warm glow over the cityscape. The street is lined with trees and buildings, their details softened by the distance. A few cars and bicycles are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the life and activity in the area. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting with the green of the trees and the various hues of the buildings.
